examples.example: 警察叔叔喊道：“站住，不许动！”

translate.english: The police uncle shouted: "Stop, don't move!"

examples.example: 当我听到有人喊“站住”时，我好奇地回头看发生了什么事。

translate.english: When I heard someone shout "Stop", I curiously turned around to see what happened.

examples.example: 在路口，交警有礼貌地喊：“站住，请等红灯。”

translate.english: At the intersection, the traffic police politely shouted: "Stop, please wait for the red light."
